As he approaches and goes through the turnstile, he transitions from the foreground into the middle ground. The turnstiles occupy the central area of the frame, extending from the middle ground into the background. Above the turnstiles, a red sign reading "Red Line trains" is prominently displayed in the upper middle part of the frame. The camera remains at the subject's level throughout, maintaining a consistent perspective as the man moves from left to right across the frame. The overall spatial composition shifts subtly as the man exits the turnstile, leaving the foreground momentarily empty before the camera continues to capture the station's interior.
